players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso, watch your back. Diana, use your skills wisely."
Diana: "Charlie confessed, I'm investigating you. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie, you mentioned being the mafioso. Diana, keep investigating."
Charlie: "Watch out Diana, I might be lying. Stay vigilant."
Diana: "Charlie, your confession was risky. Continue to be cautious."
You: "Diana, continue investigating. Charlie, you might be the mafioso. Stay alert."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
